summary: SOUTH SHORE DEALER IN INWOOD NY PERFORMED A RECALL S55 BUT PROBLEM STILL EXISTS CAR DROPS INTO NEUTRAL WHILE DRIVING, WANTED A SECOND OPINION AT GARDEN CITY DEALER THEY WOULDNT EVEN LOOK AT IT TO DO  A DIAGNOSIS TO SEE IF RECALL WAS ACTUALLY DONE. ALL I WANT IS THE RECALL DONE AND DONE PROPERLY
